title: All Ball - Former Wisconsin Star Brian Butch on Recruiting Stories, Badgers Teams, Steph Curry NCAA Tourney Loss
itunes:title: All Ball - Former Wisconsin Star Brian Butch on Recruiting Stories, Badgers Teams, Steph Curry NCAA Tourney Loss
description:
In the first part of a two-part interview, Doug talks with former Wisconsin star center Brian Butch about his Wisconsin hoops upbringing, what it's like dominating high school ball as a 7-footer, getting recruited as a McDonald's All-American, his growth at Wisconsin, running into a Step Curry buzzsaw in the NCAA Tourney, and trying to find his footing as a pro. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
